mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into User (id, userName, password, realName, address, picture, sex, idCard, phone, emil) values (#{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{address}, #{picture}, #{sex}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{emil})
mapper.update: update User set userName = #{userName}, password =#{password}, realName=#{realName}, address=#{address}, picture=#{picture}, sex=#{sex}, idCard=#{idCard}, emil = #{emil} where id = #{id}
